title: Cheria-Bariarpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
text:
Cheria-Bariarpur is an <a href="Vidhan%20Sabha">assembly</a> constituency in <a href="Begusarai%20district">Begusarai district</a> in the <a href="India">India</a>n <a href="States%20and%20territories%20of%20India">state</a> of <a href="Bihar">Bihar</a>.
Overview.
As per Delimitation of Parliamentary and Assembly constituencies Order, 2008, No. 141 Cheria Bariarpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is composed of the following: Cheria-Bariarpur, Khodabandpur and Chaurahi <a href="Community%20Development%20Block%20in%20India">community development blocks</a>; Pahsara (West) and Maheshwara <a href="gram%20panchayat">gram panchayat</a>s of Nawkothi CD Block.
Cheria-Bariarpur (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is part of No. 24 <a href="Begusarai%20%28Lok%20Sabha%20constituency%29">Begusarai (Lok Sabha constituency)</a>.
Election results.
1977-2010.
In the <a href="2010%20Bihar%20legislative%20assembly%20election">2010 state assembly elections</a>, Manju Verma of <a href="Janata%20Dal%20%28United%29">JD(U)</a> won the Cheria Bariarpur seat defeating her nearest rival Anil Kumar Chaudhary of <a href="Lok%20Jan%20Shakti%20Party">LJP</a>. Contests in most years were multi cornered but only winners and runners are being mentioned. Anil Chaudhary of LJP defeated Kumari Savitri of <a href="Rashtriya%20Janata%20Dal">RJD</a> in <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Oct%202005">October 2005</a> and Radha Krishna Singh of RJD in <a href="Bihar%20Assembly%20Election%2C%20Feb%202005">February 2005</a>. Ashok Kumar of RJD defeated Anil Chaudhary of JD(U) in 2000. Ram Jeewan Singh of <a href="Janata%20Dal">JD</a> defeated Late Sri Sukh Deo Mahato of <a href="Indian%20National%20Congress">Congress</a> in 1995 and Late Sri Sukhdeo Mahato, Independent, in 1990. Harihar Mahato of Congress defeated Late Sri Sukhdeo Mahato of <a href="Communist%20Party%20of%20India">CPI</a> in 1985. Late Sri Sukhdeo Mahato of CPI defeated Harihar Mahato of Congress (I) in 1980. Harihar Mahato of Congress defeated Jubair Azam Zaffri of <a href="Janata%20Party">Janata Party</a>.
